segments.text: I can't believe what I'm seeing right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is just standing there, drying a plate like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and she doesn’t even notice the water pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the puddle, and she’s just ignoring it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, those kids are about to cause a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on that wobbly stool, reaching for cookies like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout at them to stop before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the woman is so focused on that plate, she wouldn’t even hear me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a mess, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR
